abstract: Family of Heather Greenwood is emblematic of a growing number of American bloodlines, with roots on many continents and a mixture of different races; their experiences offer a telling glimpse into contemporary race relations; the population of mixed-race Americans is growing quickly, driven largely by immigration and intermarriage (Series: Race Remixed).
snippet: For one family, being mixed-race is not a defining issue, but outside the home, strangers gawk and make racist comments, in what has become part of life for many families like theirs.
lead_paragraph: For one family, being mixed-race is not a defining issue, but outside the home, strangers gawk and make racist comments, in what has become part of life for many families like theirs.

headline.main: In Strangers’ Glances at Family, Tensions Linger
headline.seo: For Mixed Family, Old Racial Tensions Remain Part of Life
headline.print_headline: In Strangers’ Glances at Family, Tensions Linger
